---
title: "Integration of Seurat objects"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
    # dev.args = list(png = list(type = "cairo")),
  dpi=900,
  out.width = "100%",
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE
)

library(xfun)

format_table <- function(mydf){
  mydf %>% 
    kableExtra::kbl() %>% 
    kable_paper() %>% 
    scroll_box(width = "800px", height = "200px")
}

```

```{r setup, message = FALSE}
library(chevreul)
library(Seurat)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggraph)
```

# TLDR 

you can integrate a list of seurat objects with the following function

```{r, eval=FALSE}

batches <- panc8 %>%
  Seurat::SplitObject(split.by = "tech")

integrated_seu <- integration_workflow(batches)


```
